thread.title: Petal power: Chinese artist starts east-west dialogue using flowers

title: Petal power: Chinese artist starts east-west dialogue using flowers
text:
Petal power: Chinese artist starts east-west dialogue using flowers Wednesday, March 21, 2018 - 01:48 
Internationally acclaimed artist Zhuang Hong Yi's eye-catching art work is inspired by his native China and his adoptive country, the Netherlands. Rough cut (no reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Internationally acclaimed artist Zhuang Hong Yi's eye-catching art work is inspired by his native China and his adoptive country, the Netherlands.
